lead_paragraph: TYLER--John C.,died on December 23, 2015, six days before his 84th birthday. A gentle, loving man, and lifelong resident of New York City, John touched the lives of all who met him. He was the beloved husband of the late Emma Tyler, brother of Sandra Tyler and the late Susan Tyler Faison, uncle of Kate Spencer, Shep Faison, Sally Faison, Ann Faison, Ryan Grigoletto and Kenneth Grigoletto. A memorial service will be held on the ground floor of his residence, at 339 West 24th St., New York, NY, on January 31 at 3:30pm. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TYLER, JOHN C.
